  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CheckRequest.ContentEncoding  
    CheckType
    How to choose a correct Check Type? Following are different use cases of the check with corresponding check type: Check Type Ux Use case interactive Interactive User checks her own document. batch Interactive User checks set of her own documents. baseline Noninteractive A repository of documents are checked as part of build job running nightly and the user doesn't own the documents. automated Noninteractive Check of a single document for automated scenarios as for example a git hook or save a document.
    Quality.Status  
    ReportType
